title: ‘The Race is Way Harder Now’: Strade Bianche’s Longer, Tougher Route Divides Peloton
content:
Sport directors, riders are split over route changes and wonder if the popular race over the white roads of Tuscany will lose its charm: 'It was good how it was.'

Read the full article at ‘The Race is Way Harder Now’: Strade Bianche’s Longer, Tougher Route Divides Peloton on Velo.
author: ahood
